entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of hail early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
